segments.text: Oh dear, look at that water spilling everywhere, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems nice, but she's making quite the puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she's going to have a lot of cleaning up to do after this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh they're so cute, trying to get cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite the little climber, isn't he?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, that stool doesn't look very stable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her turn to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies they have in that jar, they look delicious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen looks so ordinary, but there's so much happening in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm intruding on a private moment, but it's so interesting to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
